Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the Azure VMware Solution deployment, including compute capacity, storage needs, and network configurations. Identify workloads to be migrated or hosted.
Design the architecture for the Azure VMware Solution, including cluster sizing, resource allocation, and integration with existing Azure services.
Secure approvals and authorizations for the project, including budget, compliance, and governance requirements.
Deploy the Azure VMware Solution in the Azure portal, specifying the required compute resources, storage, and networking configurations.
Set up and configure the VMware environment, including vSphere, vSAN, and NSX-T components. Ensure proper resource allocation and connectivity.
Apply security best practices, including encryption, access controls, and integration with Azure Security Center. Configure firewalls and NSX-T policies.
Plan and execute the migration of workloads to the Azure VMware Solution environment using tools like Azure Migrate or HCX.
Perform testing to validate the deployment, including workload performance, failover scenarios, and security configurations.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and VMware tools to track performance, resource utilization, and security events.
Create detailed documentation of the solution architecture, configurations, and operational procedures for future reference and training.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure VMware Solution environment.
Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with security and operational standards. Verify resource utilization and optimize configurations as needed.
